name: getTimezoneInfo
description:
Gets local time zone information for the computer on which it
 is called, relative to Universal Time Coordinated (UTC). UTC is
 the mean solar time of the meridian of Greenwich, England.

params.name: timezone
params.description: Lucee Specify a timezone to return info from

params.name: locale
params.description: Lucee Locale used to format the output

examples.title: Output timezone information
examples.description: This example shows the use of GetTimeZoneInfo
examples.code:
The local date and time are #now()#.

Total offset in seconds is #info.utcTotalOffset#.

Offset in hours is #info.utcHourOffset#.

Offset in minutes minus the offset in hours is #info.utcMinuteOffset#.

Is Daylight Savings Time in effect? #info.isDSTOn#.

examples.title: Get Hawaii timezone information in German
examples.description: Shows the use of getTimeZoneInfo for a known / specific timezone with German locale. This syntax is only supported in Lucee.
